name: Russia Inside Out: New year
description:
Russia inside out: New Year tells about the love story of an ordinary guy from the provinces, the apogee of which will be the celebration of the New Year with his girlfriends. The game is a JRPG with elements of a visual novel, stylized in Russian style.

Vanya is an ordinary guy from a small town who has enough problems in his personal life, he often reflects, usually making it worse. On New Year's Eve, he must solve love problems that directly concern him and the girls.

Alina - A girl who is similar to the main character in her thoughts about the village is very jealous when it comes to talking about other girls, but she tries not to show it, which makes her very sweet, is interested in living life for the benefit of herself, and not lamenting your fate all the time, like the main character.
Elona - A country girl who is already difficult to distinguish from a city girl. She used to be pretty weird ...
Kira - A girl who has lived her entire conscious life in the village. She loves this place very much and does not want to hear anything bad about her, she is quite calm with the main character, showing only slight timidity and shyness.
Julia - The youngest in character, but not in age, a girl who will very much remind you of your beloved sister, but the main character should not underestimate her, because she also participates in this "arms race", and who knows what methods she will be use to get the heart of the one you love so much.
